ResourceHeader.ResourceName: Akebono SMS digital binary ion count rates
ResourceHeader.Description:
These count rate data reside in the DARTS/Akebono
binary Science DataBase (SDB).  They consist of count rates at 8-sec 
spacecraft spin resolution, separately for thermal and suprathermal 
H+, He+ and O+ ions.  Detailed information and a data-read program
are found at https://www.darts.isas.jaxa.jp/akbn/readme/readme.sms.txt.
ResourceHeader.Acknowledgement:
In any publications, the use of the Akebono data 
should be acknowledged, for example, as "Akebono SMS data were provided 
by A.W. Yau through DARTS at Institute of Space and Astronautical Science, 
JAXA in Japan."

AccessInformation.Acknowledgement:
In any publications, the use of the Akebono data 
should be acknowledged, for example, as "Akebono LEP data were provided 
by A.W. Yau through DARTS at Institute of Space and Astronautical Science, 
JAXA in Japan."
